trans-unit.source: An abstract base class that represents a cache for nonces.
trans-unit.target: 表示缓存中的，以便 nonce 抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.NonceCache"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 从初始化派生类中的构造函数调用<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.NonceCache"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum size of the cache specified as the number of nonces that the cache can contain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定的缓存可以包含的 nonce 的数目为缓存的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of the cache specified as the number of nonces that the cache can contain.
trans-unit.target: 指定的缓存可以包含的 nonce 的数目为缓存的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set a value that is less than zero occurs.
trans-unit.target: 尝试设置的值小于零时发生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum timespan after which a nonce is deleted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置后从缓存删除 nonce 的最大时间跨度。

trans-unit.source: The maximum timespan after which a nonce is deleted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 最大的时间跨度后从缓存删除 nonce。

trans-unit.source: This value should be at least twice the maximum clock skew added to the replay window size.
trans-unit.target: 此值应至少两次的最大时钟偏差添加到重播窗口大小。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to set a value that is less than <xref:System.TimeSpan> occurs.
-or- An attempt to set a value greater than the allowed maximum occurs.
trans-unit.target: -或者-尝试设置一个值大于允许的最大时发生。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, returns a value that indicates whether the specified nonce is already in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，则返回一个值，该值指示指定的 nonce 是否已在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified nonce is already in the cache; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的 nonce 缓存; 中已存在否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to add the specified nonce to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，尝试向缓存添加指定的 nonce。

trans-unit.source: The nonce to add to the cache.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the nonce was added to the cache; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 nonce 已添加到缓存;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
